title: AI Timesheet Generator with Gmail, Calendar & GitHub to Google Sheets
description:
# AI-Powered Automatic Timesheet Generator for Google Sheets

Stop wasting billable hours on manual time-tracking. **AutoTimesheet Pro** uses AI to collect emails, meetings, and GitHub work, then writes a clean timesheet straight into Google Sheets. Perfect for developers, consultants, agencies, and remote teams.

## Get Started with [n8n](https://n8n.partnerlinks.io/ds9podzjls6d) now!

---

## üöÄ Key Features

- **Automated Google Sheets time-tracking** ‚Äî zero spreadsheet prep.  
- **AI-generated activity summaries** (‚â§ 120 chars) via OpenAI GPT-4o-mini.  
- **Gmail integration** ‚Äî logs only important emails, skipping newsletters & no-replies.  
- **Google Calendar time logger** ‚Äî captures confirmed events, duration, and attendees.  
- **GitHub commit & PR tracker** ‚Äî records your commits plus opened/closed PRs.  
- **Daily 7 PM cron trigger** (easily adjustable).  
- **Month-based sheet creation** ‚Äî new tab spins up on the first run each month.  
- **No-code n8n template** ‚Äî just connect credentials and tweak one **Set Variables** node.
- **üîå Easily extensible** ‚Äî drag-and-drop extra n8n nodes to add Slack, Jira, Notion, Asana, Trello, Toggl, or any other data source you need.

---

## üîç How It Works

1. **Collect** ‚Äî n8n pulls data from Gmail, Google Calendar, and chosen GitHub repos.  
2. **Clean** ‚Äî filters remove noise (newsletters, irrelevant commits, etc.).  
3. **Condense** ‚Äî OpenAI rewrites each item into a concise, SEO-friendly description.  
4. **Write** ‚Äî workflow appends *Date*, *Type*, and *Description* to your **Timesheet** Google Sheet.
5. **Extend** ‚Äî simply insert new n8n nodes (e.g., Slack, Notion, Jira) and merge them into the same pipeline.

---

## üìà Benefits for SEO-Minded Professionals

- **Keyword-rich activity log** improves internal search and reporting.  
- **Structured data** in Sheets simplifies export to accounting or PM tools.  
- **Consistent naming** (`CALENDAR_EVENT`, `EMAIL`, `COMMIT`, `PR`) makes analytics easy.

---

## ‚úÖ Why Choose AutoTimesheet Pro?

- Zero manual entry ‚Äî just open the sheet and bill clients.  
- Immediate visibility into where your hours went.  
- Works with any GitHub repo list and any inbox you own.  
- 100 % no-code setup ‚Äî activate in minutes.
- Built on n8n, so you can customize and scale without limits.
---

## üì• Get Started

Ready to replace manual time-tracking with smart automation?  

#### https://n8n.partnerlinks.io/ds9podzjls6d

Join **N8N** now, connect your Google & GitHub accounts, and let AI handle your daily log.

---
disclaimer: This workflow is provided as-is. Please review and test before using in production.
